overview: With raucous videos, rare footage of the guys on the road and exclusive interviews with the band, this Pantera collection is a must for aficionados of the popular heavy-metal group. Videos include Cowboys from Hell, I'm Broken, Drag the Waters, Mouth for War and Primal Concrete Sledge. Also contains footage of Pantera wowing the crowd during a performance at the Monsters of Rock Festival in Moscow.
title: Pantera: 3 Vulgar Videos From Hell
